name: Gray Fullbuster
sub_desc: I'll show you what real ice magic is...
desc: POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!. The next figure to join the POP UP PARADE series is the Ice-Make Mage Gray Fullbuster! He's been recreated in a powerful pose putting his hands together. Be sure to display him with POP UP PARADE Natsu Dragneel (sold separately)!

name: Lucy Heartfilia
sub_desc: Open, twelve gates! Zodiac!!
desc: POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!. The next figure to join the POP UP PARADE series is the Celestial Mage Lucy Heartfilia! She's been recreated in her costume from the final season. Be sure to display her with POP UP PARADE Natsu Dragneel (sold separately)!

name: Natsu Dragneel
sub_desc: The Fairy Tail Guild's Mage, Natsu Dragneel!
desc: POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!. The next figure to join the POP UP PARADE series is the Dragon Slayer who always looks out for his friends, Natsu Dragneel, from 'Fairy Tail Final Season'! He has been recreated in an imposing stance with a raised fist, ready to fight. His jacket part is removable, allowing for multiple display options. Be sure to add him to your collection!

name: Joker
sub_desc: Presenting new POP UP PARADE figures from Persona5!
desc: POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!. The next figure to join the POP UP PARADE series is Joker, the leader of the Phantom Thieves of Hearts, from 'PERSONA5 the Animation'! Joker has been recreated in 170mm size in a dynamic pose with a daring smile on his face. Look out for more POP UP PARADE figures from 'PERSONA5 the Animation' coming soon!

name: Goblin Slayer
sub_desc: The third figure in the POP UP PARADE series is Goblin Slayer!
desc: POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!. The third figure in the series is Goblin Slayer from the anime series 'GOBLIN SLAYER'! The weathered appearance of his battle-worn armor has been meticulously recreated. The figure is just the right size to fit any display. Be sure to add him to your collection!

name: Saber Lily
sub_desc: The knight-princess dressed in pure white.
desc: POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!. The next figure to join the POP UP PARADE series is the Saber-class servant Altria Pendragon (Lily) in her second ascension appearance. Her lily-shaped skirt and the beautiful ivory color of her dress have been faithfully recreated, capturing the knight-princess' charm in figure form.

name: Shiro
sub_desc: Brother, do you believe...in Shiro...?
desc: POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!. The next figure to join the POP UP PARADE series is Shiro from No Game No Life! Shiro has been recreated in a dynamic pose holding the Lovey-Dovey Gun from a game from the series. The characteristic gradation of her hair has been carefully captured in figure form.

name: Kaneki Ken
sub_desc: I am a ghoul.
desc: POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!. The next figure to join the POP UP PARADE series is the half-ghoul Ken Kaneki. He's been recreated in a calm pose staring intently before him. Interchangeable head parts to display him with his mask on are included as well. Be sure to add him to your collection!

name: Juzo Inui
sub_desc: The Over-Extended with a revolver for a head.
desc: POP UP PARADE is a new series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and releases planned just four months after preorders begin! Each figure stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!. The next figure to join the POP UP PARADE series is Juzo Inui, the Over-Extended with a revolver for a head. His revolver head has been carefully recreated with weathered paintwork for a detailed look. His coat features three layers of gradated paintwork for a heavy appearance.

name: Sekiro
sub_desc: Take Revenge. Restore your honor. Kill Ingeniously.
desc: From the popular game 'Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice' comes a figma of the one-armed shinobi Sekiro. The creation of the figma was entirely supervised by From Software, making for a stunningly accurate recreation.

name: Hyakkimaru
sub_desc: I will take back the body the demons stole from me.
desc: From the anime series Dororo comes a figma of the character whose body parts were stolen by 12 demons, Hyakkimaru!

name: Raphtalia
sub_desc: I am your sword. No matter how rough the path, I will follow you.
desc: From the anime series 'The Rising of the Shield Hero' comes a figma of the demi-human heroine, Raphtalia!

name: Oracle
sub_desc: Behold the new me!
desc: From the popular anime series 'PERSONA5 the Animation' comes a figma of one of the members of the Phantom Thieves - Oracle!

name: Edelgard von Hresvelg
sub_desc: The noble leader of the Black Eagles house.
desc: From the popular game 'Fire Emblem: Three Houses' comes a figma of Edelgard von Hresvelg!

name: Darkness
sub_desc: A figma of the perverted Crusader!
desc: From the movie 'KONO SUBARASHII SEKAI NI SYUKUFUKU WO! LEGEND OF CRIMSON' comes a figma of Darkness!

name: Tanya Degurechaff
sub_desc: What are you doing, twitching like a shrimp? Want me to feed you to the pigs?
desc: From the anime movie 'Saga of Tanya the Evil - The Movie' comes a figma of Tanya Degurechaff!

name: Satou Kazuma
sub_desc: Farewell boring life! Hello fantasy world!
desc: From the movie 'KONO SUBARASHII SEKAI NI SYUKUFUKU WO! LEGEND OF CRIMSON' comes a figma of Kazuma!

name: Megumin
sub_desc: My name is Megumin!
desc: From the anime series 'KONO SUBARASHII SEKAI NI SYUKUFUKU WO! 2' comes a figma of the Explosion Arch-Wizard, Megumin!

name: Aqua
sub_desc: If you truly are one of my followers… it would be great if you could lend me some money!
desc: From the anime series 'KONO SUBARASHII SEKAI NI SYUKUFUKU WO! 2' comes a rerelease of the figma of the Goddess of Water, Aqua!

name: Panther
sub_desc: No more holding back...!
desc: From the popular RPG game 'Persona 5' comes a figma of one of the members of the Phantom Thieves - Panther!

name: Leonardo Watch
sub_desc: The 'All-Seeing Eyes of the Gods' join the figma series!
desc: From the anime series 'Blood Blockade Battlefront & Beyond' comes a figma of the holder of the All-Seeing Eyes of the Gods - Leonardo Watch!

name: Genji
sub_desc: Even if I sacrifice my body, I will never sacrifice my honor.
desc: From the globally popular multiplayer first-person shooter Overwatch® comes a figma of Genji!

name: Nero Claudius
sub_desc: Listen in ecstasy. Then trust, and rekindle your love once more!
desc: From the popular game 'Fate/EXTELLA' comes a figma of the Saber servant, Nero Claudius !

name: Ayanami Rei
sub_desc: A new Nendoroid of Rei in a Plugsuit!
desc: From the popular animated film series 'Rebuild of Evangelion' comes a fully articulated Nendoroid of Rei Ayanami [Tentative Name] in a Plugsuit! She comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a downcast expression and a combat expression. Optional parts include her backpack and an interior part to recreate the inside of the entry plug. A scythe is also included for even more ways to display her. Be sure to add her to your collection, along with the other Nendoroids of the Evangelion Nendoroid series!

name: Takagi-san
sub_desc: You finally looked at me.
desc: From the anime series 'Karakai Jozu No Takagi-san 2' comes a Nendoroid of Takagi-san! She comes with three face plates including a smiling expression, a teasing expression for when teasing Nishikata-kun and a laughing expression! Various parts are included to recreating Takagi-san on her way to school and other scenes and poses. Pair with the desk and chair from Nendoroid Playset #01: School Life Set A and B (both sold separately) to display her looking your way in the classroom.

name: Tomioka Giyu
sub_desc: The Water Hashira. One who slays demons with the calmest judgement.
desc: From the popular anime series 'Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba' comes a Nendoroid of the Water Hashira of the Demon Slayer Corps, 'Giyu Tomioka'! He comes with three face plates including a standard expression, an angered expression and a surprised expression. He comes with a Water Breathing effect part, recreated with even higher detail than the parts included with Nendoroid Tanjiro. A sheet to recreate Water Breathing Eleventh Form: Dead Calm is included as well. His Kasugai Crow is also included. Enjoy recreate both cool and comical scenes with Giyu! Be sure to add him to your collection!

name: Matou Sakura
sub_desc: If I became a bad person, would you be able to forgive me?
desc: From 'Fate/stay night: Heaven's Feel', the anime movie trilogy with a third and final movie coming soon, comes a Nendoroid of the movie series' heroine Sakura Matou! She comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a smiling expression and a sorrowful expression, lamenting her own fate. She also comes with several optional parts including her school bag, a grocery bag, her apron, a ladle and a plate. Additionally, a Command Seal hand part and Makiri's Grail effect parts are also included. Be sure to add her to your collection!

name: Catarina Claes
series: My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
sub_desc: You people should try being reborn as Catarina just once, let's see how you like that!
desc: From the popular anime series 'My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!' comes a Nendoroid of the main character Catarina Claes! She comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a smiling expression and a deliberating expression for displaying Catarina while she's having a meeting inside of her head. Optional parts include a hoe, a muffin, a romance novel and an Earth Bump, allowing you to recreate all kinds of different scenes from the show. Be sure to add her to your collection!

name: Ristarte
sub_desc: Come on now, let's go save the world! ...this guy is such a pain!
desc: From the anime series 'Cautious Hero: The Hero Is Overpowered But Overly Cautious' comes a Nendoroid of Ristarte, the goddess who summoned the 'impossibly cautious' hero! She comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a crying expression and a comical serious expression. Interchangeable leg parts are included so you can recreate her pose from the show when she complains at the hero! A magic circle part is also included for reading her opponent's status! Be sure to add her to your collection!

name: Misaka Mikoto
sub_desc: Tokiwadai Middle School's 'Railgun'.
desc: From the popular anime series 'A Certain Scientific Railgun S' comes a rerelease of the Nendoroid of Tokiwadai Middle School's 'Railgun', also known as Mikoto Misaka! She comes complete with a number of cute optional parts which feature her beloved 'Gekota' character - including her schoolbag with a Gekota strap as well as her Gekota themed cellphone! She also comes with electric effect parts for both her head and the front of her arm, allowing you to display her in her element. The coin used for her trademark 'Railgun' attack is also included! All these optional parts can be used to show off the 'Electric Princess' in a range of poses from epic combat scenes to cute embarrassed scenes, allowing fans to decide which they prefer!

name: Himiko Toga
sub_desc: Isn't blood cute? I love it so much.
desc: From the popular anime series 'My Hero Academia' comes a Nendoroid of Himiko Toga, member of the League of Villains! She comes with three face plates including a devilish standard expression, an expression with her tongue sticking out (which comes with an alternate mouth part without her tongue sticking out) and a sinister smiling expression that looks as though she can barely hide one of her schemes. Her special equipment and a bloody knife are included to recreate scenes of her gathering blood to use her 'Transform' Quirk, along with a text plate for recreating action scenes. Be sure to add her to your collection!

name: Hatsune Miku
sub_desc: Hatsune Miku is now a Nendoroid Doll!
desc: From 'Character Vocal Series 01: Hatsune Miku' comes a Nendoroid Doll of Hatsune Miku! Nendoroid Dolls feature the same Nendoroid heads, but an alternate doll-like body that is highly articulated and can easily be dressed-up into different outfits while still remaining a palm-sized action figure! Miku's twintails have been sculpted to be even more voluminous in Nendoroid Doll form! Be sure to add Hatsune Miku in her faithfully recreated outfit to your collection!

name: Kafuu Chino
sub_desc: Sisters...? I'll have to call you 'big sister' then...
desc: From the anime series 'Is the Order a Rabbit?'' comes a rerelease of the Rabbit House café's only daughter, Nendoroid Chino! She comes with three face plates including a listless standard expression, a doubtful expression with glaring eyes as well as an excited expression for when she sees something cute. Optional parts include a coffee cup, vacuum coffee maker and a counter to recreate the atmosphere of the Rabbit House café! Her rabbit 'Tippy' is also included together with a special cup to sit in! Nendoroid Cocoa has also been announced and will be up for preorder at the same time, so be sure to order her too!

name: Hotto Cocoa
sub_desc: Just leave it to your big sister!
desc: From the popular anime 'Is the Order a Rabbit??' comes a rerelease of the Nendoroid of the Rabbit House café's employee, Cocoa! She comes with three face plates including a cheerful standard face, a smiling face with closed eyes as well as a determined expression beaming with confidence. Optional accessories include café's items such as a coffee cup and tray, as well as the rabbit Tippy and a digital camera. The Nendoroid also includes the dog ears and tail that featured in the series! Be sure to display her together with Nendoroid Chino who is being rereleased at the same time! Is the order two Nendoroids?

name: Nakano Miku
sub_desc: ...Go out with me.
desc: From the anime series 'The Quintessential Quintuplets' comes a Nendoroid of the third Nakano sister, Miku! She comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a sulking expression and a blushing expression. Optional parts include a can of matcha soda and interchangeable sitting parts to display her in the middle of taking off her tights! Be sure to add her to your collection!

name: Yukinoshita Yukino
sub_desc: Will you listen to my request?
desc: From the anime series 'My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU 3' comes a Nendoroid of the president of the service club, Yukino Yukinoshita! She comes with three face plates including a standard expression, a smiling expression and an embarrassed expression. She comes with her school bag, a book and cat ears as optional parts, along with interchangeable parts that allow you to pose her holding a Pan the Panda plushie! Be sure to add the mysterious and cute 'Yukinon' to your collection!

name: Rem
sub_desc: Let's start from here. From step one... no, from zero!
desc: From the anime series 'Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-' comes a rerelease of Nendoroid Rem, one of the maids at the Roswaal mansion. Her cute maid uniform has been carefully converted into Nendoroid size and her standard expression is based on the scene where she first met Subaru and had a bit of an untrusting, cold gaze. She also comes with a smiling expression for much more cheerful poses! Her third expression is the memorable 'oni' expression from the series, and she also comes with alternate front hair parts with a horn in order to fully recreate the oni form. Her morning star is also included in two different forms - one with a static chain for dynamic action poses as well as one with a real chain. Enjoy all sorts of different sides of Rem with her Nendoroid!

name: Ram
sub_desc: I also believe my sincerity is one of my best virtues.
desc: From the anime series 'Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-' comes a rerelease of the Nendoroid of Ram, one of the maids at the Roswaal mansion with her cute maid uniform has faithfully converted into Nendoroid size! She comes with three face plates including a standard expressionless face, a smiling face for poses together with Rem as well as a shouting face to use together with her wind magic effect parts to pose her in combat. She also includes a potato and a knife to display her performing one of the few jobs she performs in the mansion. Special holding hand parts to place her in a joint pose with Nendoroid Rem are also included, so be sure to display the two of them together!

name: Emilia
sub_desc: Emilia-tan is such an angel!
desc: From the anime series 'Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World-' comes rerelease of the Nendoroid of the half-elf heroine, Emilia! Her characteristic outfit has been faithfully converted into cute Nendoroid size, and she comes with three face plates including a standard expression, an angry expression as well a crying expression based on the scene from the final episode. Optional parts include the robe she used to hide her identity as well as magic effect parts to display her casting her water magic. The spirit Pack is of course also included to display by her side! Be sure to display her with Nendoroid Rem and Nendoroid Ram and recreate your favorite scenes from the series!

name: Amiya
sub_desc: Doctor, I'm glad... we could meet again.
desc: From the popular smartphone game 'Arknights' comes a rerelease of Nendoroid Amiya, leader of the Rhodes Island organization! She comes with three face plates including her standard expression, her shouting expression and her smiling expression. Ego Absorption effect parts and her violin are also included as optional parts! Be sure to add her to your collection!

name: Shinomiya Kaguya
sub_desc: How cute...
desc: From the anime series 'Kaguya-sama: Love is War' comes a Nendoroid of Kaguya Shinomiya, student council vice president of Shuchiin Academy. She comes with three face plates including her smiling standard expression, a 'How cute...'' expression and a 'Cuuute!' expression from when she saw the student council president with cat ears on! Optional parts included her flip phone and a pair of the 'miraculously compatible' cat ears.

name: Kurumi Tokisaki - Bunny Ver.
sub_desc: My, my. A customer?
desc: From KADOKAWA's Fantasia Bunko Editorial Department's light novel series 'Date A Live' comes a 1/7th scale figure of heroine Kurumi Tokisaki! She's been recreated in a bunny outfit based on an illustration by Tsunako. Her outfit features a red and black color scheme, a glossy finish and real net tights, making for a gorgeous recreation with plenty of textural detail that you can see and feel.

name: Mai Sakurajima: Water Gun Date Ver.
sub_desc: The radiant, adorable Mai-senpai in a T-shirt and swimsuit!
desc: From the hit Dengeki Bunko light novel that also received an anime adaption, 'Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai' comes a 1/7th scale figure of Mai Sakurajima based on an illustration from the Dengeki Bunko Choukansha Fair 2016! Mai is wearing a cute swimsuit that can be seen beneath her wet T-shirt while enjoying a date at the beach. Be sure to add her to your collection!

name: Kogane Tsukioka: Face of Treasure Ver.
sub_desc: Leave it all to me!
desc: From the game made for the 'enza' game platform, 'THE IDOLM@STER SHINY COLORS', comes a scale figure of L'Antica's positive and confident center, Kogane Tsukioka! She has been faithfully recreated based on in-game card illustration, 'Wait on the Shores of the Moon'. The various mechanical decorations adoring her 'Face of Treasure' outfit have been carefully recreated as well. Be sure to add her to your collection!

name: Katsushika Hokusai
sub_desc: My kimono being all disheveled like an oiran is a good look for me? Aw, q-quit it...that's embarrassing... ...Even Toto-sama's gone all quiet.
desc: From the popular smartphone game 'Fate/Grand Order' comes a scale figure of the Foreigner class servant Katsushika Hokusai. Her obi belt and various flower decorations throughout the figure have been faithfully captured in figure form. She's been recreated based on her 2nd Ascension appearance, with her chest boldly exposed beneath her disheveled kimono. Wave effect parts and plover bird effect parts based on Hokusai's woodblock print 'Mount Fuji Above the Sea' are included and easily attached to the figure, making for a beautifully detailed display piece. Be sure to add her to your collection!

name: Tohsaka Rin ~15th Celebration Dress Ver.~
sub_desc: Celebrating 15 years of Rin, with many more to come.
desc: From the Fate/stay night ~15th Celebration Project~ comes a scale figure of Rin Tohsaka in a beautiful dress designed by Takashi Takeuchi for Fate’s 15th Anniversary. Rin's elegant crimson dress has been intricately sculpted and painted to bring out her cheerful beauty. Celebrate 15 years of Fate/stay night by adding her to your collection.

name: Matou Sakura ~15th Celebration Dress Ver.~
sub_desc: Celebrating 15 years of Sakura, with many more to come.
desc: From the Fate/stay night ~15th Celebration Project~ comes a scale figure of Sakura Matou in a beautiful dress designed by Takashi Takeuchi for Fate’s 15th Anniversary. Sakura's elegant violet blue dress has been intricately sculpted and painted to bring out her ephemeral beauty. Celebrate 15 years of Fate/stay night by adding her to your collection.

name: Saber ~15th Celebration Dress Ver.~
sub_desc: Celebrating 15 years of Saber, with many more to come.
desc: From the Fate/stay night ~15th Celebration Project~ comes a scale figure of Saber in a beautiful dress designed by Takashi Takeuchi for Fate’s 15th Anniversary. Saber's elegant white dress has been intricately sculpted and painted to bring out her distinguished beauty. Celebrate 15 years of Fate/stay night by adding her to your collection.

name: Kasumigaoka Utaha
sub_desc: Nice to meet you. Let's work hard together.
desc: From 'Saekano: How to Raise a Boring Girlfriend', comes a 1/7th scale figure of Utaha Kasumigaoka! The figure is based on the jacket illustration of the first season Blu-ray box, and has been sculpted and painted with a unique touch in order to capture the look and feel of Kurehito Misaki's illustration in figure form. Utaha has been recreated in a dynamic pose that almost looks like she'll spring to life at any moment. Various items representative of her character surround her, making for an exciting figure with plenty of small details to look at. Be sure to take a close look once she joins your collection!

name: Yuki Mikan: Bare Leg Bunny Ver.
sub_desc: The ultimate little sister now in a Bare Leg Bunny version!
desc: From the popular series 'To Love-Ru Darkness' comes a bare leg bunny figure of Mikan Yuki! The figure is an impressive 1/4th scale and features specially features Mikan's bare legs. Be sure to display with Golden Darkness: Bare Leg Bunny Ver., Momo Belia Deviluke: Bare Leg Bunny Ver. and Yui Kotegawa: Bare Leg Bunny Ver. (all sold separately) and create your own To Love-Ru bunny girl harem!

name: Kotegawa Yui: Bare Leg Bunny Ver.
sub_desc: The student council president is back in a Bare Leg Bunny version!
desc: From the popular series 'To Love-Ru Darkness' comes a bare leg bunny figure of Yui Kotegawa! The figure is an impressive 1/4th scale and features specially features Yui's bare legs. Be sure to display with Golden Darkness: Bare Leg Bunny Ver., Momo Belia Deviluke: Bare Leg Bunny Ver.. and Mikan Yuki: Bare Leg Bunny Ver.. (all sold separately) and create your own To Love-Ru bunny girl harem!

name: Momo Velia Deviluke: Bare Leg Bunny Ver.
sub_desc: Momo is coming to your collection again!
desc: From the popular series 'To Love-Ru Darkness' comes Momo Belia Deviluke, this time in a bunny outfit with bare legs! The figure is an impressive 1/4 scale in size and features lovely bare legs that are sure to please fans. Be sure to display her with Golden Darkness: Bare Leg Bunny Ver., also available for preorder, and create your own To Love-Ru bunny girl harem!

name: Golden Darkness: Bare Leg Bunny Ver.
sub_desc: Is this the kind of thing you're into?
desc: From the popular series 'To Love-Ru Darkness' comes Golden Darkness, this time in a bunny outfit with bare legs! The figure is an impressive 1/4 scale in size and features lovely bare legs that are sure to please fans. Be sure to display her with Momo Belia Deviluke: Bare Leg Bunny Ver., planned for future release, and create your own To Love-Ru bunny girl harem!

name: Rindo Kobayashi: Bunny Ver.
sub_desc: Feast your eyes on Rindo-senpai!
desc: From the anime series with a 5th season confirmed 'Food Wars! Shokugeki no Soma' comes a B-style figure of Rindo Kobayashi! The wild and mischievous Rindo-senpai has been recreated in a bold pose. No matter the angle, her exceptional curves will leave you wanting to stare for hours. Fine details such as her cat eyes and fangs have been carefully recreated as a part of her sexy expression. Don't miss her impressive bust too! The figure is 1/4th scale (470mm tall) and features net tights made from real material for a truly authentic appearance and texture! Be sure to add her to your collection!
